about_the_game:
Hayley and David seems to be the perfect couple. She is an aspiring artist, he a hard working manager. Hayley's world is turned up-side down when suddenly her fiancée disappears without a trace.



The young man erases any trace of his presence in their tattered house. The only thing he leaves behind is an audio recording with Hayley’s name on it. The recording will take her on journey to discover a shocking truth about their relationship and herself.

Will Hayley be able to find all the clues left by David? Will she discover the truth behind his sudden disappearance? What other secret lurks inside their house?



'You never listen' is a psychological drama set in early 90's targeted at mature audience. The game touches on themes such as substance abuse, emotional violence and neglect.

short_description: Hayley finds her apartment empty. The love of her life packed and gone. What starts as a search for an answer soon turns into a personal journey. Was her life as perfect as she remembers it ? With each new clue she finds, the truth becomes more and more unbelievable.
